General.Name: ATrack Technology
General.Description: ATrack Technology Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells GPS trackers in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides telematics and asset tracking products, as well as accessories. It also offers software products, such as ATrack Device Management, a web-based centralized device management platform; and ATrack Configuration Tool, a tool for configuration of ATrack devices. The company's products are used in logistics, construction and mining, cold chain, school bus, car sharing and rental, and agriculture industries. ATrack Technology Inc. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
